sAqviqtrANi# juhOtiq prasU$tyai caturgRuhIqtEna# juhOtiq catu#ShpAdaH paqSava#H paqSUnEqvA&va# rundhEq cata#srOq diSO# diqkShvE#va prati# tiShThatiq CandA(gm)#si dEqvEByO &pA$&krAmaqn na vO# BAqgAni# haqvyaM ~Mva#kShyAmaq itiq tEBya# 
Eqtacca#tu-rgRuhIqtama#-dhArayan purO&nu vAqkyA#yai yAqjyA#yai dEqvatA#yai vaShaTkAqrAyaq yacca#turgRuhIqtaM juqhOtiq CandA(gg)#syEqva tat prI#NAtiq tAnya#sya prIqtAni# dEqvEByO# haqvyaM ~Mva#hantiq yaM kAqmayE#taq - [  ] 1
